project.name: |-- 013-partitioning
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Collectors + partitioning + partitioningBy
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
PartitioningRunner: Illustrates the use of Collectors.partitioningBy to perform partitioning operations.
PrimeNumberRunner: Illustrates how to perform partitioning between prime and non-prime numbers using streams.
